Summary: vertical pulsating green or turquoise beam of light
trends: There have been no other sightings in Richmond
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting Details2 miles east of little America and 16 miles west of green river, Wyoming. approx. time was 6:48 am,On my way to work I noticed a glare from my left, as I turned to look, I could not believe what I was seeing. A vertical pulsating beam of light greenish in color, I was approximately a mile and quarter south of the interstate driving east, the beam descended with quick bursts of even brighter light same in color, and ascended back up, the event lasted around 80 to 90 seconds. Although the distance from the interstate was just little over a mile, it was still softball size and not hard to miss. I hope others will come forward and report the event.
